metadata.title: Friday, 26th June, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development what the progress on the construction of mini-hydro power stations in the following areas is
parts: (a)    Chikata Rapids on the Kabompo River in Kabompo District; and

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what plans the Government has to improve water and sanitation facilities which are in a very poor state in most schools in Kwacha Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)    when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    how many schools in Mitete District have the following grades:
(i)    grades 1 – 7; (ii)    grades 1 – 9; (iii)    grades 8 – 12; and (iv)    grades 10 – 12; and
(b)    when all the basic schools country-wide will be phased out.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the construction of Chunga Bridge, in Nakonde Parliamentary Constituency, will commence;
(b)    what the cost of the project is; and
(c)    what the time-frame for completing the project is.
(a)    whether the Government has any plans to start announcing the floor price of the following crops prior to the planting season:
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c)    if there are no such plans, why.
